participant_1.background:
I like to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail
I love 3d modelling in my spare time.
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.

participant_2.background:
My biggest challenge was having to work from home and not being able to interact with my colleagues in person.
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i have always enjoyed telling stories to people.
i am afraid of clowns.

content.text: Hello!
Hi!
I’m from a small town in the Midwest, what about you?
I live in the suburbs, love the peace and quiet.
Me too, I love how I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
Same, I love being able to take a break from work and just relax in the park.
I have a friend named Abigail, she’s a great artist.
Oh that’s awesome, I love art! I do 3D modeling in my spare time.
That’s cool! I’ve never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
I’ve only been once, but it was amazing! I loved the beaches and the food.
I love pasta, do you have any favorite pasta dishes?
I love carbonara, it’s so delicious!
That sounds delicious, I’m going to have to try that sometime!
You should, it’s one of my favorites.
Have you ever been to a Halloween party?
Yes, I love Halloween! I always go all out with my costume.
Me too, I love dressing up and having fun with friends.
I’m afraid of clowns, so I don’t go to any haunted houses.
Clowns are scary, I don’t blame you.
I’m glad we’re on the same page about that
